entry.title: Durable Functions: A More Durable Azure Function
entry.summary:
Description

Serverless functions-as-a-service lets you run event-triggered code without having to explicitly provision or manage infrastructure. While they are powerful, they also have limitations. In this talk, we’ll discuss how Durable Functions can overcome the limitation by extending Azure Functions to let you write stateful functions in a serverless …
entry.content:
Description

Serverless functions-as-a-service lets you run event-triggered code without having to explicitly provision or manage infrastructure. While they are powerful, they also have limitations. In this talk, we’ll discuss how Durable Functions can overcome the limitation by extending Azure Functions to let you write stateful functions in a serverless compute environment.
